nodes.text: N0-HX was an astromech droid that worked for Agent Fauler of the Republic Strategic Information Service. N0 worked as a messenger for Fauler during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, when the agent was stationed on Tatooine. Fauler used N0-HX to contact a Republic-allied individual and asked for their help on an issue with a doomsday device dealing with Czerka.

N0-HX was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It contacts Republic players as they are leaving the spaceport, starting the Czerka Corp bonus series of missions.
